messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Father's Drydock XVI door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Weed is legal and may be distributed, and any drugs that chemistry make can also be distributed, just don't go killin peeps

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Somebody broke into my office and stole my clothes and hardsuit, if it's not returned the suspect will be put up for immeidiet arrest

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Comms is down, just whoever took my stuff come to the bridge

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Gavin kellog and the janitor borg are now kos

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: For people who want an explantion they commit grand theft, and breakign and entry onto a high priority site, grand theft is execution worthy by space law

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Father's Drydock XVI, please stand-by.
